Data Scientist / Data Analyst #

Community Dreams Foundation â€” Aug 2025 â€“ Present

At Community Dreams Foundation, I work as a Data Scientist supporting nonprofit and community health initiatives, applying advanced analytics to evaluate program effectiveness, optimize resource allocation, and support evidence-based decision-making for underserved populations.

My role focuses on building scalable analytics pipelines, transforming operational and demographic data into actionable insights, and communicating results to program leaders and stakeholders.
